title: Lead Scraping & Automated Outreach System
subtitle: Telegram-Triggered Data Scraping, Email Verification & Multi-Stage Follow-ups
description: A fully automated lead generation and outreach system that pulls business data, verifies emails, and runs multi-stage personalized follow-ups without human effort.

metric.label: in Productivity
metric.outcome: 10x more leads processed with the same team

problemStatement.main: The client was exhausted by manually scraping websites, copying leads into spreadsheets, sending emails one by one, and tracking follow-ups. This resulted in wasted hours, missed opportunities, inconsistent outreach, and low scalability.

points.title: MANUAL SCRAPING
points.description: Visiting websites individually and manually extracting lead data.

points.title: TEDIOUS EMAILING
points.description: Copy-pasting and sending emails to each prospect manually.

points.title: MISSED FOLLOW-UPS
points.description: Leads were forgotten due to lack of a proper tracking system.

points.title: INEFFICIENT PROCESS
points.description: High effort produced low volume and caused team burnout.

timeline.title: WORKFLOW SETUP
timeline.description: Set up n8n environment, Telegram bot, and scraping workflows.

timeline.title: OUTREACH SYSTEM
timeline.description: Integrated email validation, outreach logic, and Google Sheets syncing.

timeline.title: SCALE
timeline.description: Tested follow-ups and scaled system to process 5,000+ leads per day.

pipeline.title: Telegram Lead Input
pipeline.description: The client sends business niche and location via Telegram which triggers the automation.

pipeline.title: Automated Scraping
pipeline.description: n8n scrapes business data from the web and extracts emails, phone numbers, and company details.

pipeline.title: Data Organization
pipeline.description: All scraped data is cleaned and synced into Google Sheets as a live lead database.

pipeline.title: Email Validation & Outreach
pipeline.description: Emails are verified and valid leads enter a personalized multi-step email sequence.

pipeline.title: Smart Follow-ups
pipeline.description: Automated follow-ups are sent on Day 2, Day 7, and Day 14 without any manual intervention.

outcomes.outcome: Saved 40+ hours per week in manual scraping and emailing.
Able to scrape over 5,000 leads per day.
Handles up to 3,000 automated emails per day.
Achieved 10x more output with the same team size.
